import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Loader from '../Loader'; function FormInput({ greeting, action, authFunction }) { const [isAuthenticating, setIsAuthenticating] = useState(false); const [formFields, setFormFields] = useState({ email: '', password: '', }); const handleChange = (event) => {}; return (

{greeting}

{action} to your account

Don't have an account?{' '} Sign up

); } export default FormInput;
